dialogue.introduction: Is a nice breeze coming? It's time for me, the next generation destroyer prototype, Amatsukaze, to debut.
dialogue.library_intro: I'm Amatsukaze, the Ninth Kagerou-class Destroyer. I was tasked with being the test bed of a new type of high-temperature, high pressure boiler meant for the next generation of destroyer. With the data in tow, I was able to hand this over to Shimakaze. I was in many tight spots, but I have been able to constantly overcome them. It was really tough!
dialogue.secretary1: I wonder what kind of wind is blowing.
dialogue.secretary3: Stop it, don't touch my hair. You'll mess up the windsock.
dialogue.secretaryidle: Eh? It's not like I'm bored or anything. I have a lot to do after getting the data for the new boiler. I-I'm not lying!
dialogue.secretarymarried: You...you should take a break from time to time, they are important too...are you even listening? Honestly...
dialogue.wedding: You, what is this exactly? Eh? For me? Ummm...I'll take it I guess... You... you're really fine with it being me? Thank you.
dialogue.show_players_score: So how are you doing? ...Hmmmmmm. Not bad I suppose.
dialogue.docking_minor_damage: Haa, I'm tired. May I head back?
dialogue.docking_moderate_damage: Bathtime, bathtime I say! I don't want to smell all sweaty.
dialogue.docking_complete: The repair is complete. An improvised repair, what's that?
dialogue.ship_construction: A new girl has arrived. ...Not that I mind.
dialogue.return_from_sortie: The fleet has returned. Thanks for the good work.
dialogue.start_a_sortie: The 2nd Torpedo Squadron isn't just for show. Come along now, Yukikaze!
dialogue.battle_start: This is a good wind...Commencing attack!
dialogue.attack: I won't let you escape! This is a good wind... commencing attack!
dialogue.night_battle: Didn't I said that I won't let you escape?
dialogue.night_attack: It's all right...a good wind is blowing!
dialogue.artillery_spotting: It's all right...a good wind is blowing!
dialogue.night_special_attack_modifier_cutin_at_n: It's all right...a good wind is blowing!
dialogue.support_expedition_team_arrival: It's all right...a good wind is blowing!
dialogue.mvp: I'm...Amatsukaze is the distinguished ship? M-my, isn't it fine? How's this, Tokitsukaze?
dialogue.moderately_damaged: Ahh, the bow and the first cannon's been hit! Even so, I won't sink!
dialogue.sunk: I finally sank into the sea this time... It's so cold... and dark...

hourly.0100: 0100 yawn~ I'm a little sleepy now. Are you not going to sleep yet?
hourly.0200: 0200 I wonder, has Hatsukaze slept yet? Yukikaze is already sleeping, huh... yup.
hourly.0300: 0300 No way... You're gonna stay up all night today? I'm not staying up with you.
hourly.0400: 0400 Geez... I said I'm not staying up with you... You're stubborn... It's already morning.
hourly.0600: 0600 But still...the morning breeze feels good. Hey, do you agree?
hourly.0700: 0700 ...The wind feels good, right? Heey~ wanna spend some time off the coast?
hourly.0800: 0800 Ok, your breakfast is ready. You are fine with Japanese breakfast right?
hourly.0900: 0900 It's time for full scale fleet action soon. What's your plan?
hourly.1000: 1000 Shimakaze!?... erm... that's right... we are just fr... friends...wha.. What's with that face?
hourly.1100: 1100 What is it? Rensouhou-kun? Cute right? He looks small and quiet at the bow.
hourly.1200: 1200 I wonder if the curry is fine as your lunch? It's my speciality! really!
hourly.1300: 1300 How was my curry? hmm? Glad to hear that!
hourly.1400: 1400 Shimakaze and me, who is faster? I wouldn't know even if you asked... because I've never competed with her before.
hourly.1500: 1500 Speed is not a problem. I was tested a lot because I'm a prototype.
hourly.1600: 1600 Weird...why is rensouhou-kun in a bad mood?
hourly.1700: 1700 The evening breeze feels good too... wanna view the sunset here, together?
hourly.1800: 1800 It's time for dinner soon. Are you fine with grilled fish?
hourly.1900: 1900 ...Ok, here's your dinner... How was it? Was it good?... I see... I'm glad~!
hourly.2000: 2000 Oh... Shimakaze, how are you? ehh? ...What? A race!? I'm not gonna do it! It's night...
hourly.2100: 2100 I just said I don't want to race! You're so persistent, Shimakaze!
hourly.2200: 2200 S-She finally left... Geez... What's wrong with her!
hourly.2300: 2300 The day is ending soon. Good job, see you tomorrow.
